content: I can't know for certain how blumhouse productions determines their distribution strategy. however, there are some common factors that may influence their decisions, including the genre, rating, and target audience of each film. for example, a horror film may have a better chance of performing well in theaters where audiences are looking for a communal experience, while a more niche indie drama may do better on a streaming service with a more targeted viewer base. additionally, blumhouse productions may consider the marketing and promotion efforts of each distributor, as well as their reach and reputation with the target audience. ultimately, the decision of which channels to use for releasing films is likely a complex one that considers multiple factors and involves input from various stakeholders within the company.
